attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As lecturers in the FE sector we find the IFL to be a pointless and bureaucratic waste of time.  It is inefficient and drains precious time and attention away from teaching and learning.  As quangos are coming under increasing scrutiny in these economically tight times, it seems to be an incredible waste of money.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
